The slant height is}\\ \text{the length of the - well - slant.} \\ \underline{\text{As it is a right-circular cone}} \\ \begin{align} L^2 &= h^2 + R^2 \implies R^2 = L^2-h^2 \\ \therefore V &= \frac{\pi}{3}\cdot R^2 \cdot h = \dfrac\pi{3}\cdot (L^2-h^2)\cdot h \end{align}
